# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an empty modify subscriptions operation.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Creating a Modify Subscriptions Operation

- **init(subscriptionsToSave:subscriptionIDsToDelete:)**: Creates an operation for saving and deleting the specified subscriptions.

items.description: Creates an operation for saving and deleting the specified subscriptions.
items.name: init(subscriptionsToSave:subscriptionIDsToDelete:)
